title: Next Wave of Stablecoin Boom May Seem Invisible, Says Transak CEO
contentSnippet: Transak co-founder and CEO Sami Start said stablecoin adoption will feel increasingly invisible as they are folded into consumer applications.

title: What is the Fusaka Upgrade? Ethereum’s Biggest Scaling Bet Yet
contentSnippet: The December 2025 upgrade promises to increase Ethereum's data capacity eightfold, adding tougher defenses, and new developer tools.

title: Bitcoin's $100K Question: Here's Why BTC, XRP, SOL May Surge This Week
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has rebounded above $103,000, lifting altcoins.

title: The 5 Hottest AI-Powered Side Hustles That Actually Seem Plausible
contentSnippet: From "faceless" YouTube channels to AI-generated product demos, 2025’s hottest “hour-a-day” hustles promise easy money—but success still takes testing, luck, and a lot of automation.

title: Crypto Prices Rise as Trump Announces ‘At Least’ $2K Tariff Dividend Per American
contentSnippet: The rally comes after a broader weekly slump, with the CoinDesk 20 (CD20) index recovering from a near 15% drawdown over the week.

title: Wall Street is Bought in On Crypto’s Upside Potential, But Not Its Tech
contentSnippet: Despite record levels of institutional investment, most Wall Street firms are still trading off-chain, says Annabelle Huang, co-founder and chief executive officer of Altius Labs.

title: U.S. Regulator That May Rule Over Digital Assets Pushing Toward Crypto Spot Trading
contentSnippet: The CFTC's interim boss, Caroline Pham, is said to be personally guiding exchanges on launching compliant products as she also overhauls the agency.

title: Spain’s Civil Guard Arrests Alleged Leader of 260M Euro Crypto-Linked Ponzi Scheme
contentSnippet: The alleged Ponzi scheme attracted over 3,000 victims by offering guaranteed returns on contracts tied to various assets.

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、リップルの770億円調達やジーキャッシュ高騰の背景分析など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナなど主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: 週明けから急落のビットコイン、相場復調の前提条件は？｜bitbankアナリスト寄稿
contentSnippet: 今週のビットコイン相場は続落の見通し。AIバブル崩壊や景気後退懸念から1560万円周辺まで下落。ただし短期筋の97%が含み損となっており、下値余地は限定的との指摘も。bitbankアナリストが今後の展望を解説。

title: 週刊ニュース｜金融庁の仮想通貨ETF関連デリバティブ国内提供への見解やBTC10万ドル割れに高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、暗号資産ETF関連デリバティブの国内提供に対する金融庁の見解、ビットコインの10万ドル割れ、仮想通貨の最新市場分析に関する記事が関心を集めた。

title: The Great Korean Pivot: From Memecoins to Machine Chips
contentSnippet: As crypto trading volumes collapse in South Korea, retail investors are flocking to the stock market, fueling a state-backed AI-driven rally that’s replaced altcoin mania with semiconductor fever.

title: The 'Big Short' Guy Just Bet $1.1 Billion Against AI Giants—And Markets Are Still Absorbing It
contentSnippet: Renowned hedge fund manager Michael Burry disclosed massive bearish positions on AI darlings after warning of market bubbles. The CEO of Palantir was not pleased.

title: Bitwise Solana ETF Sees Steady Demand as Bitcoin, Ethereum Funds Shed Assets
contentSnippet: Including seed investments, the fund has generated more than $545 million in net inflows.

title: Since Trump's Election, Crypto Has Experienced a Wild Year-long Ride
contentSnippet: The industry's staunch ally (and sometimes business partner) in the White House has brought a flood of drama, both good and bad.

title: State of Crypto: SBF (Somehow) Had Another Bad Day in Court
contentSnippet: An appeals court seemed very skeptical of the FTX founder's push for a new trial.

title: Cardsmiths' New Currency Cards Include Over $500K in Real Bitcoin, Dogecoin and Ethereum
contentSnippet: You could win a full Bitcoin from a pack of trading cards, thanks to Cardsmiths' latest set of Currency collectibles—with Dogecoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin too.

title: Long DATs, Short Futures: A New Wrinkle On The Basis Trade
contentSnippet: As regulated futures proliferate across alts, the “long DAT, short futures” trade could become an ideal way for Wall Street to capture crypto yield without touching a wallet or suffering from the inte

title: Bitcoin Whales vs Everyone Else, and the Whales Are Winning
contentSnippet: Large bitcoin holders continue to offload as smaller investors accumulate, creating a stark divide in market behavior.

title: JPモルガンのビットコインETF保有量、3ヶ月間で64%増
contentSnippet: JPモルガンが第3四半期にブラックロックのビットコインETFを207万株追加し、保有総数は528万株となった。6月から64%増加。

title: イーサリアムのバリデータ参加待ちが増加　将来性への信頼高まり示すか
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨イーサリアムのバリデータ参加待ちが増加している。The Blockが長期視点の投資家増加が示唆されると指摘した。ステーブルコインのインフラとしての期待も高まっている。

title: 「ビットコインは重要なサポートレベル付近で推移」CryptoQuantレポート
contentSnippet: CryptoQuantが最新市場レポートで、仮想通貨ビットコインが10万ドル付近の重要サポートレベルで推移していると指摘した。複数の指標から現在の状況を分析している。

title: ストラテジー、STRE優先株を1株80ユーロで価格設定　1100億円調達予定
contentSnippet: ストラテジーが10%利回りのSTRE優先株を1株80ユーロで発行し、7億1500万ドルを調達する予定。当初計画の2倍超となる775万株を発行し、資金はビットコイン取得に充てられる見込みだ。

title: ビットコイン再び10万ドル割れ、USDXデペッグがDeFiに波及し信用不安広がる｜仮想NISHI
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ビットコインは5日以来、再び一時10万ドルを割り込んだ。ステーブルコイン「USDX」の担保不足によるデペッグ（乖離）が複数のDeFiプロトコルに波及し、市場全体に信用不安を広げた。

title: トランプメディア、第3四半期に84億円の赤字、保有ビットコインの価値は73億円減
contentSnippet: トランプメディアが第3四半期に5480万ドルの純損失を計上し、3四半期連続の赤字となった。保有ビットコインの価値は4800万ドル減少したが、オプション収入で1530万ドルを獲得。

title: カザフ、最大10億ドルの仮想通貨準備基金設立へ　2026年初頭立ち上げ予定
contentSnippet: カザフスタンが最大10億ドル規模の国家仮想通貨準備基金を2026年初頭までに設立する。押収資産と国営マイニング収益を原資としてETFや関連企業に投資する方針だ。

title: Trump Brothers' American Bitcoin Boosts BTC Holdings to $415 Million–Stock Seesaws
contentSnippet: The Nasdaq-listed BTC miner is now the 25th largest Bitcoin treasury.

title: Privacy Coin Zcash Continues Historic Surge, Nearing 8-Year High Price
contentSnippet: Over $51 million worth of Zcash short positions were liquidated Friday due to the price surge, with the privacy coin up 74% this week alone.

title: OpenAI Sought Government Loan Guarantees Days Before Sam Altman's Denial
contentSnippet: OpenAI's letter to the White House requested federal loan guarantees for AI infrastructure, contradicting CEO Sam Altman's claim that the company doesn't want government support.

title: A Quarter of Polymarket Volume May Be Wash Trading, Columbia Study Finds
contentSnippet: Researchers say a quarter of trades on the prediction platform show signs of artificial activity.
